name: Pigs Fly Lite
description:
A reimagining of the wildly popular Flappy Bird formula!
Up, up, and away! Tap to ascend into the wild blue yonder. Multiple game modes to choose from.

* Flight Mode: Fly through a barrage of barriers.
* Hero Mode: Avoid an onslaught the bugs & barriers and collect food along the way.
* Feast Mode: Same as hero mode, but your pig grows with each food collected. Collect the golden food to shrink back to normal size.

FEATURES:
* Easy to learn, difficult to master game mechanics
* Multiple game modes: Flight, Hero, Feast
